noun.description: A loud, resonant metallic sound or series of sounds.
examples: the steel door slammed shut with a clang

verb.description: Make or cause to make a clang.
examples: the belfry still clangs its bell at 9 p.m.
she turned the faucet on and the plumbing clanged

origin: Late 16th century: imitative, influenced by Latin clangere resound.
